Message:
Her Holiness wasn’t
the only one who changed.

One after another,
my fellow knights
became more distant...

and some of them changed
in the same way
Her Holiness did.

Just what in the world
is happening?
This isn’t like
Her Holiness at all...

There’s no one more righteous
than Her Holiness!

How can I call myself a knight
if I don’t have faith in her?!

From then, I obeyed what
Her Holiness ordered me to do.

All the while knowing that
all those girls were innocent...

What I would give...
for someone to hunt
me down too...

I grappled with that thought,
but was powerless
to do anything.
I spent day after day
executing her orders,
